35
A. Including multilingual information in 
the ontology meta-model
¾ Advantages:
• Increase of other languages is easily done by including just 
labels in the ontology.
• Suitable for highly specialized domain ontologies: knowledge 
shareable among different linguistic community experts.
¾ Disadvantages:
• Linguistic information included in the ontology is limited.
• Full synonym relation is assumed among labels in the different 
languages, but it is not true.
